originalText.text:
Nela is INCREDIBLE!  Nela and her wonderful team shot our November wedding and captured the day and all its moments perfectly - we are so beyond thrilled with all the photos. Nela made us feel at ease on the day and was so lovely throughout the planning process, always available to answer any questions.
An amazing (& vast!) selection of "sneak peeks" was delivered right after the big day and our full collection followed shortly afterwards.
You will not find better!!!!!! :)

originalText.text:
Choosing a wedding photographer is undoubtedly one of the most crucial decisions. Fortunately, I had the absolute pleasure of working with Nela, a truly exceptional photographer, who made my wedding day even more memorable. I want to share my experience and give a well-deserved five-star review to this amazing professional.

From the moment I booked her services, engagement shoot and weeding day, I knew I had made the right choice. Not only did she exhibit remarkable technical skills and a keen eye for capturing those breathtaking candid moments, but she also went the extra mile to create a comfortable and welcoming atmosphere as if she were a guest at the wedding herself.

She effortlessly blended in with the crowd, ensuring that she captured all the essential moments of the day without ever feeling intrusive. This level of professionalism and attention to detail allowed us to fully enjoy the celebration, knowing that every special moment would be beautifully documented. Ive been to weddings where the photographers are in the mix of the party and it is just a drag for the guests to have someone standing in front of you when you’re trying to celebrate the bride and groom- this wasn’t the case.

Moreover, her warm and friendly demeanor immediately put us at ease. A wedding day inevitably comes with nerves, but having a photographer who was so approachable and understanding truly made a difference. Her reassuring presence helped everyone relax and be themselves, resulting in genuinely candid and authentic shots that perfectly portrayed the joy and love that filled the room.

What impressed me the most was her ability to anticipate moments without missing a beat. Whether it was an emotional exchange of vows or a spontaneous dance move, she expertly captured each moment, preserving cherished memories for a lifetime. It felt like she had an uncanny ability to be in the right place at the right time, ensuring that no precious memory would go undocumented.

In conclusion, I cannot recommend Nela enough. Her exceptional skills, remarkable ability to blend in like a guest, and dedication to capturing every special moment truly sets her apart. If you're looking for someone who will not only deliver creatively stunning photographs but also make you feel comfortable throughout the day, then look no further! Hiring her was one of the best decisions we made for our wedding, and I'm forever grateful for the stunning memories she has captured.

originalText.text:
Nela is, by far, the most talented and skilled photographer I have had the pleasure of working with.  From the very first meeting, Nela exuded professionalism, warmth, and a genuine passion for her work. Her attention to detail and commitment to understanding our vision were evident throughout the entire process. She took the time to listen to our ideas, preferences, and concerns, ensuring that she was able to deliver exactly what we envisioned.

On the day of the wedding, Nela truly went above and beyond our expectations. She seamlessly blended into the event, capturing intimate moments and candid interactions without ever being obtrusive. She had a grounding presence that was so valuable in such a whirlwind of a day.

Most importantly to me, Nela managed to capture the subtle emotions that made our wedding truly unique. She captured us as a couple on our wedding day - not just a bride and groom. Our true expressions were documented naturally and (seemingly) effortlessly.

In addition to her incredible photography, Nela was our easiest vendor to work with. She is the consummate professional. She was punctual, organized, and coordinated with other vendors and members of the wedding party with ease. Her positive and fun demeanor put everyone at ease, making the entire process enjoyable and stress-free. Furthermore, the post-production work was nothing short of exceptional. The final edited images were delivered quickly, and we were thrilled with the outcome.

Nela captured our wedding day in a way that exceeded our wildest dreams, and for that, we are forever grateful. Thank you Nela!

originalText.text:
A true artist. I truly cannot say enough good things about Nela! Nela shot my fine jewelry line and branding photos. I was absolutely blown away by every picture! Nela makes you feel so comfortable and at ease in front of the camera. The experience from start to finish was incredible as she helped put together a detailed mood board and gave me amazing tips on how to prepare for the shoot.
In addition to the beautiful pictures, Nela was unbelievable to work with throughout the entire process. She was so responsive to every email and question I had about the process. She is extremely creative and has an amazing artistic eye for photography. I can't wait to book her for another shoot in the future. I would highly recommend her for wedding, life style, or branding photography!

originalText.text: Booking Nela for our photos was one of the best decisions we made! Nela, as a person, is incredibly warm and kind. In regard to her photography skills, she is truly amazing. We had seen her work in publications and were really drawn to them which is what prompted us to work with her. She was able to put my wife and me at ease and made the photo sessions so much fun. Our photos turned out like a dream! We loved meeting Nela and working with her was such a special experience. If you are looking for a master of her craft, you honestly cannot go wrong with Nela.
